songs.title: Every Breath You Take
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Every move you make
Every breath you take
Every vow you make
Every single day
I'll be watching you

[Verse 2]
Every single day
Every word you say
Every bond you break
Every single day
I'll be watching you

[Bridge]
Oh, can't you see?
You belong to me
How my poor heart aches with every breath you take

[Verse 3]
Every move you make
Every breath you take
Every vow you make
Every single day
I'll be watching you
